description:
The curtain rises on the fight between the strongest S ranked fighter Nanami, and the Ninja Master. As the fight rages between those two, Shinemon gets tormented by the sub-manager......!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Token Fight!! Plant VS Evil Decoy!!
Tokkun Taiketsu!! Plant vs Evil Decoy!!
トークン対決!! プラントvs妖魔変幻[イビルデコイ]!!
